rules: Rule1: If an Organization hired a Person, then the Organization was successful.
Rule2: Either an Organization hired a Person or an Organization planted a Person.
Rule3: Provided that a Person compromised Furniture, an Organization monitored a Region or an Organization tracked a Person.
Rule4: Under the condition that an Organization replaced Furniture, the Organization secured Furniture.
Rule5: Whenever a Person escaped, it is not the case that an Organization suspected that Person.
Rule6: If a Person vanished, then an Organization did not suspect that Person.
Rule7: Provided that a Person confessed, the Person implicated an Organization.
Rule8: Either a Person confessed or, if it is not the case that the Person escaped or vanished, then the Person was captured.
Rule9: Whenever a Person blackmailed an Organization, the Person cooperated with that Organization.
Rule10: If an Organization threatened a Person, then, if the Person blackmailed an Organization, the Person did not cooperate with that Organization.
Rule11: Provided that a Person deleted a Game, if the Person did not infiltrate an Organization, then the Person was not exposed.
Rule12: Either a Person deleted a Game or a Person encrypted a Game.
Rule13: Under the condition that a Person encrypted a Game, the Person hid that Game.
Rule14: If a Person hid a Game, then the Person destroyed the Game.
Rule15: Provided that a Person forged a Game, the Person modified the Game.
Rule16: A Person forged a Game or a Person corrupted a Game.
Rule17: If a Person corrupted a Game, then, if the Person destroyed the Game, then, if the Person did not infiltrate an Organization, the Person was not exposed.
Rule18: Provided that a Person modified a Game, the Person altered the Game.
Rule19: Whenever a Person accessed a Region, the Organization was successful.
Rule20: If a Person altered a Game, then, if the Person destroyed the Game, then, if the Person did not infiltrate an Organization, the Person was not exposed.
Rule21: Under the condition that a Person copied a Game, the Person extracted the Game.

Rule22: Provided that a Person transmitted a Game, if it is not the case that, if an Organization did not plant a Person, then the Person accessed a Region, then the Organization detected the Person, then the Person copied the Game.
Rule23: If a Person uploaded a Game, then the Person transmitted the Game.
Rule24: Under the condition that a Person downloaded a Game, the Person transmitted the Game.
Rule25: Provided that a Person shared a Game, the Person uploaded the Game.
Rule26: Either a Person shared a Game or a Person received a Game.
Rule27: If a Person received a Game, then the Person downloaded the Game.
Rule28: Whenever an Organization located a Person, the Organization identified the Person.

Rule29: Provided that a Person infiltrated an Organization, if it is not the case that, if an Organization did not plant a Person, then the Person accessed a Region, then the Organization detected the Person, then the Person extracted a Game.
Rule30: Under the condition that an Organization monitored a Region, the Organization was successful.
Rule31: If an Organization tracked a Person, then the Organization was successful.
Rule32: Provided that it is not the case that if a Person confessed, then the Person did not implicate an Organization, then the Person blackmailed an Organization.
Rule33: If it is not the case that if an Organization planted a Person, then the Person accessed a Region, then the Organization did not detect the Person.
Rule34: Provided that a Person did not compromise Furniture, the Organization replaced Furniture.
Rule35: If a Person did not infiltrate an Organization, then the Organization suspected the Person.
Rule36: Under the condition that a Person did not infiltrate an Organization, the Person was exposed.
Rule37: If a Person did not infiltrate an Organization, then the Organization located the Person.
Rule38: Whenever a Person did not infiltrate an Organization, the Person was arrested.
facts: Fact1: An Organization threatened a Person.
Fact2: It is not the case that an Organization secured Furniture.
Fact3: A Person was not captured.
Fact4: An Organization did not identify a Person.
Fact5: A Person did not extract a Game.
Fact6: A Person was not arrested.
